description: Safety incidents that can occur during operations with response options

incidents.title: Falling Tree Fatality
incidents.description: A 28-year-old faller was struck and killed by a widow-maker during harvest operations
incidents.cause: Inadequate hazard assessment and communication failures

incidents.title: Equipment Rollover Fatality
incidents.description: Heavy equipment operator crushed when loader rolled over on steep terrain
incidents.cause: Equipment operated beyond safe slope limits, no rollover protection

incidents.title: Transportation Fatality
incidents.description: Logging truck driver killed in highway collision with loaded trailer
incidents.cause: Driver fatigue and inadequate vehicle maintenance

incidents.title: Chainsaw Accident
incidents.description: Worker suffered severe leg lacerations requiring emergency helicopter evacuation
incidents.cause: Improper chainsaw safety procedures and inadequate first aid response

incidents.title: Helicopter Crash
incidents.description: Helicopter carrying 4 workers crashed during crew transport, 2 critical injuries
incidents.cause: Pilot error in poor weather conditions, inadequate weather protocols

incidents.title: Herbicide Exposure Incident
incidents.description: 3 workers hospitalized after exposure to herbicide spray drift
incidents.cause: Inadequate wind monitoring and personal protective equipment failures

response_options.description: Full cooperation with investigation, implement all safety recommendations
response_options.detail: Hire external safety consultants, implement gold-standard protocols

response_options.description: Standard compliance response, meet minimum legal requirements
response_options.detail: Basic legal compliance, internal safety review

response_options.description: Minimize response, challenge WorkSafeBC findings in court
response_options.detail: Aggressive legal defense, minimal safety improvements
ILLEGAL: Attempt to corrupt government officials
